name: The West Condominiums

reviews.text: We have skiied in Steamboat at least four other times. This was a great value, a short walk to the slopes, and not at the ski-in/ski-out prices. The service was great, the condo was clean, roomy and a beautiful view of the mountain. We will definitely stay there again on our next trip.
reviews.title: Highly Recommend the West Condomiums

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I travelled to Steamboat for the first time to ski. We were looking for a ski in/out but the prices were too high. We stumbled upon this on a website and then saw the high rating on TripAdvisor.
reviews.title: Great Condo and Great Skiing

likes.liked: — View, hot tub, convenience, fireplace, free shuttles

reviews.text: Well, we love it. Our one bedroom condo has a great view of the mountain. Living area is spacious with completely equipped kitchen and gas log fireplace. Floor to ceiling windows provide lots of light and beautiful view.
reviews.title: Ideal Ski Condo

likes.disliked: — Denied our request for a late check out

reviews.text: Bedroom and bath are small but very nice. The office has coffee and donuts in the morning. Two great hot tubs and outdoor pool. The staff is very friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Perfect for convention

likes.disliked: — nothing - I was entirely satisfied in all aspects.

reviews.text: This is our first ski trip that we did not rent a car based upon recommnedation of friends. It has been great, they have free shuttles that go everywhere (be sure to tip the drivers)
reviews.title: Great Stay at The West

reviews.text: We stayed at The West for five nights in early March, 2009. We had the same condo as we had the year before. It was fine and quite comfortable, 2 bedrooms, good for our family of 3. The only quibbles were that the condo seemed a tiny bit dated, -- the kitchen and bathrooms were renovated and the rooms were furnished well -- the carpeting was a bit dingy, though, and the sofa upholstery was tired looking, too. It had a well-stocked kitchen.
reviews.title: Our second stay at The West, as good as the first, AND great doughnuts!

reviews.text: Also, we had a problem with a running toilet, and while the management got it fixed two days later, we got tired of hearing the flushing sound every 10 minutes and cut off the water whenever we weren't using it. Not a big deal, but prompter repair would have been nice.
reviews.title: First time in Steamboat - The West was a great choice!

reviews.text: The location is great, not ski-in/ski-out, but almost as good. Free ski storage about 150 yards away at the base of the gondola, and a pleasant, pretty short stroll to get to the ski storage and the skiing -- down a hill, across the street at the transportation hub and through the gondola shopping area. Then onto the mountain. It's an unbeatable location.
reviews.title: The West is one of the Best

likes.liked: — Room, decor and amenities, quiet, location, helpful staff
likes.disliked: — Can't think of anything...there were stairs, occasional tight parking...this is minor

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: No underground parking so your car is out in the elements; it hasn't been a problem for us. We haven't been there during a blizzard.
reviews.title: Enjoyed our Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We all agree it was very nice. Also, complimentary doughnuts in the morning, along with coffee--both at the office.
reviews.title: Perfect place for a ski vacation

likes.liked: — location, view, hot tubs, friendly staff
likes.disliked: — walking up three flights of stairs

reviews.text: We stayed at the West Jan 13-17, 2007 and loved it.
reviews.title: Loved the West

reviews.text: 2 of us and our 4 yr old had a 1 bedroom, with sofa sleeper.
reviews.title: wonderful stay

likes.liked: — location, the interior was so clean and looked brand new

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: That's the best thing about these condos is the great location.Right across the road from the lifts.The free shuttle is also great,to downtown or the grocery.there is a great restaurant right down the hill at The Grand Hotel called the Cabin.We really liked The West Condos,the only thing they need to do is to modernize the furnishing.The bedding and the TV are from years past. It's time for a 42inch LCD TV..
reviews.title: Location, Location,Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This place was great to stay especially if you plan on skiing or want to be close to the bottom of the slopes. It is only a couple of minutes walk to the Gondola (or they will drive you).
reviews.title: Great location and good accomidations

reviews.text: The room that we stayed in had a fully furnished kitchen (including dishwasher). Storage for wet ski clothes just at the door. The main bed was located in a loft area and the stairs were quite steep. We never used the pull out couch. The gas fireplace was nice touch and put out a lot of heat.
reviews.title: Great bargain--but be sure to travel light

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The heated pool and the 2 hottubs were sufficient even though the hottubs were inside.
reviews.title: Great location, all you could ask for

reviews.text: I got a great bargain when I stayed at The West last month. I enjoyed my studio which had a kitchen, gas fireplace and lots of closet space--all of whcih was a good value. Moreover, the building had a coin laundry unit at the bottom.
reviews.title: Definitely on my list of places to return

description: The West is one of Steamboat's favorite lodges no matter what season your visiting Steamboat Springs. It's not ski in/ ski out but it does have one of the shortest walks to the base of the ski area and gondola entrance. Sitting on a knoll, the 360 degree views are worth the stay. Free parking and Wi-Fi are a few of the great amenities and the complimentary winter shuttle service is the best in the boat.
